# Critical CEO Decisions
### Go/No-Go Decision Framework

Use framework from `references/executive_decision_framework.md`:

**Major Decisions Requiring Framework**:

- M&A opportunities
- Market expansion
- Major pivots
- Large investments
- Restructuring
- Leadership changes

**Decision Checklist**:

- [ ] Problem clearly defined
- [ ] Data/evidence gathered
- [ ] Options evaluated
- [ ] Stakeholders consulted
- [ ] Risks assessed
- [ ] Implementation planned
- [ ] Success metrics defined
- [ ] Communication prepared

### Crisis Management

#### Crisis Leadership Playbook

**Level 1 Crisis** (Department)

- Monitor situation
- Support as needed
- Review afterwards

**Level 2 Crisis** (Company)

- Activate crisis team
- Lead response
- Communicate frequently

**Level 3 Crisis** (Existential)

- Take direct control
- Board engagement
- All-hands focus
- External communication
